content:
Craft an item of type: acacia_boat
inventory=[{"type": "cod_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 10}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 17, "index": 26}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 37, "index": 27}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 23, "index": 29}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 13, "index": 35}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 47, "index": 37}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft an acacia boat, I need to place 5 acacia planks in the shape of a U in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one acacia plank from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: acacia_boat

thought: I have placed one acacia plank in the top left corner of the crafting grid. I will now place another acacia plank in the top right corner of the crafting grid by moving it from slot 38 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 3 with quantity 1

thought: I have placed two acacia planks in the top row of the crafting grid. I will now place another acacia plank in the middle of the left column of the crafting grid by moving it from slot 38 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
